C

ChanceItGame - Class in <Unnamed>
ChanceItGame plays the game of Chance-It, the simple dice game introduced by Joel Adams at Calvin College in the late 1990's.
ChanceItGame(int, String, String) - Constructor for class ChanceItGame
Constructs a new Chance-It game with the specified number of rounds.
